controls.name: Account Management
controls.description: Instance has a specific security group: Ensure access control policies are established and implemented.

criteria.description: Instance has a specific security group

controls.name: Access Enforcement
controls.description: Ensure only authorized transactions and functions are allowed.

criteria.description: Ensure only authorized transactions and functions are allowed

controls.name: Information flow Enforcement
controls.description: Ensure CUI flow is controlled.

criteria.description: Control the flow of CUI in accordance with approved authorizations.

controls.name: Separate the duties of individuals to reduce the risk of malevolent activity without collusion.
controls.description: Ensure duties are separated.

criteria.description: Instance has roles with separate duties

controls.name: Least Privilege.
controls.description: Employ the principle of least privilege, including for specific security functions and privileged accounts.

criteria.description: Instance uses least privilege for IAM roles

controls.name: Least Privilege — Privileged Accounts.
controls.description: Ensure that privileged accounts are used only for their intended purposes.

criteria.description: Instance uses least privilege for privileged accounts

controls.name: Least Privilege — Privileged Functions
controls.description: Prevent non-privileged users from executing privileged functions..

criteria.description: Prevent non-privileged users from executing privileged functions.

controls.name: Limit unsuccessful logon attempts.
controls.description: Ensure unsuccessful logon attempts are limited.

criteria.description: Instance limits unsuccessful logon attempts

controls.name: Use session lock with pattern-hiding displays to prevent access and viewing of data after a period of inactivity.
controls.description: Ensure session lock with pattern-hiding displays is used.

criteria.description: Instance uses session lock with pattern-hiding displays

controls.name: Terminate (automatically) a user session after a defined condition.
controls.description: Ensure user sessions are terminated automatically after a defined condition.

criteria.description: Instance automatically terminates user sessions after a defined condition

controls.name: Monitor and control remote access sessions.
controls.description: Ensure remote access sessions are monitored and controlled.

criteria.description: Instance monitors and controls remote access sessions

controls.name: Use of External Systems.
controls.description: Ensure connections to external systems are verified and controlled.

criteria.description: Instance controls connections to external systems

controls.name: Event Logging
controls.description: Ensure system audit logs and records are created and retained.

criteria.description: Instance creates and retains system audit logs

controls.name: Audit Record Content.
controls.description: Ensure actions of system users can be traced.

criteria.description: Instance traces actions of individual system users

controls.name: Audit Record Generation.
controls.description: Retain audit records for a time period consistent with the records retention policy.

criteria.description: Retain audit records for a time period consistent with the records retention policy.

controls.name: Alert in the event of an audit logging process failure.
controls.description: Ensure alerts are generated in the event of an audit logging process failure.

criteria.description: Instance alerts in the event of audit logging process failure

controls.name: Audit Record Review, Analysis, and Reporting
controls.description: Correlate audit record review, analysis, and reporting processes for investigation and response to indications of unlawful, unauthorized, suspicious, or unusual activity.

criteria.description: Instance correlates audit records for investigation

controls.name: Audit Record Reduction and Report Generation.
controls.description: Ensure audit reduction and report generation is provided.

criteria.description: Instance provides audit reduction and report generation

controls.name: Provide a system capability that compares and synchronizes internal system clocks with an authoritative source to generate time stamps for audit records.
controls.description: Ensure system clocks are synchronized with an authoritative source.

criteria.description: Instance synchronizes system clocks with an authoritative source

controls.name: Protection of Audit Information.
controls.description: Ensure audit information is protected from unauthorized access.

criteria.description: Ensure audit information is protected from unauthorized access

controls.name: Create and retain system audit logs and records to the extent needed to enable the monitoring, analysis, investigation, and reporting of unlawful or unauthorized system activity.
controls.description: Ensure system audit logs and records are created and retained.

criteria.description: Instance creates and retains system audit logs
